creator: The Sports Office UK
descriptionHtml:
The Sports Office App from The Sports Office is a powerful, personalised link between a club and its squads. It optimises all communication, sports science, sports medicine, coaching and administrative processes between an organisation and its players or athletes. The App integrates with Sports Office performance management solutions to provide a comprehensive range of personalised support.

It is an indispensable tool for coaches and elite sport practitioners to drive improved performance.

The App enables elite sports organisations to offer significantly enhanced support to players. It ensures maximum efficiency and effectiveness in critical areas including communication, coaching and administration.

Video is a key area of functionality offered by the new Player’s App. Staff can assign specific videos to players to maximise engagement, learning and progression. Footage can also be categorised to enhance focused player reflection and personalised playlists can be created. Videos can be downloaded to view offline.

The Newsfeed and Dashboard areas provide a real-time update of relevant information directly from the club. Social media accounts can also be synced to support player output and ensure consistency with club policy and public statements.

The Sports Office App enhances communication between staff and players with secure instant messaging and push notifications.

The app is compatible with data from a wide range of third party sources. This allows use of sports science/performance analysis data from providers including OPTA and StatSports.
